title: Louis Vuitton
subtitle: Authentication Course
description: Learn to authenticate Louis Vuitton handbags with our expertly designed course. Gain the insider knowledge used by professional authenticators to spot genuine LV pieces. From decoding the iconic monogram to analyzing date codes and hardware, this course will provide you with practical skills to confidently identify authentic Louis Vuitton craftsmanship.
course_section_description: This course is structured into six modules, each focusing on a specific aspect of luxury bag authentication:
highlight: Learn to authenticate Louis Vuitton handbags with our expertly designed course.
instructor_description:
Sophie is a certified luxury authenticator with years of experience in teaching and a passion for fashion. She's worked closely with the expert team of authenticators for each brand at Legit App to create courses that are clear, practical, and easy to follow.

With a background in education and extensive teaching experience, Sophie's approach is as easy-going as her cheerful personality. Her lessons are straightforward, to the point, and designed to make even the most complex details simple to understand. Whether you're a first-time learner or a seasoned collector, you'll feel right at home with her clear and approachable teaching style.
